briefTitle: Expanding Rural Access: Distance Delivery of Support Groups (Main Study)
officialTitle: Expanding Rural Access: Distance Delivery of Support Groups (Main Study)
conditions: Depression, Breast Cancer, Stress, Breast Cancer Non-invasive Breast Cancer, Breast Cancer Early Stage Breast Cancer (Stage 1-3), Breast Cancer Metastatic Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Intensity and frequency of posttraumatic stress symptoms in the past month as assessed by total score on the Posttraumatic Check List - Specific version (PCL-S) for breast cancer.
